question: Being that I suffered from a kidney stone this past January, this article caught my eye. I thought 24 was awfully young to suffer from a kidney stone, but to my surprise, young children can suffer from them. I cannot imagine a child going thru as much pain as I suffer thru my 5 day stone-passing ordeal. It is so important that we give our children a healthy diet. This is what could result if we don't keep in check of the salty snacks, crackers/chips, and fast food we may give our children(besides the obvious obesity and diabetes).http://www.nytimes.com/2008/10/28/health/28kidn.html?_r=1&em&oref=slogin
title: I thought this was an interesting article...
